## `worflows/analysis-codeql.yml`

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
## `worflows/analysis-sonar.yml`
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Build, run tests, collect coverage, analyze with SonarCloud and upload the 
coverage data to Codecov.
